Dr Esko Suoranta. Dissertation: The Sky Above the Port Was the Color of Capitalism: Literary Affordance and Technonaturalist Speculative Fiction https://helda.helsinki.fi/items/d5576644-26e8-4f10-b622-0fc3a7acd4ff.

Cognitive literary studies, literary theory, SF, contemporary literature. "Imagine, democracy" research project at Tampere University/Koneen säätiö. Editor-in-chief for Avain - Finnish Review of Literary Studies. World Fantasy Award Winner.
